main.name: Rambojun Tavish Kumar
main.occupation: Application Support,Analyst, Software Developper, Gamer, Web Developper
main.description: Started as Application Support Analyst with non-industrial Development Skills and talents.
main.bio: My name is Tavish, I started my career with java skills an Application Support Analyst after my graduation, at Ceridian Mauritius and worked for StoredValueSolution Company for 3 years. Along side with Support Analyst, i have been working on several minor Development project to enhance my industrial Development skills. During these years, i have mastered SQL skills and unix C-Shell Scripting. Moreover, I have been giving training to newcommers.

work.title: Application Support Analyst level 1
work.description: Analyst/Developper-------SVS - Stored Value Solution (101 Bullitt Ln #305, Louisville, KY 40222, USA) Mauritius -Lead and supported the SVS company(card gifting system) support team to monitor and setup batch jobs and ensuring that all SLA are completed on time. Work with clients to deliver customs reports based on SQL queries. - Setup Unix batch job (shell scripting) - Setup Tandem/HPE batch job (COBOL Script)  - Solved, fix and upgraded old batch job of the process.- Assisted the online team to resolve real time POS issues. - Collaborated with different functional teams on the same project. -Trained new recruits with detailed explanations on each tasks, project's process, SQL coach and UNIX coach. - Learn C#. Manipulated and developed UNIX shell Scripts to automate recurrent jobs and facilitate data transfer between applications. Automate Jobs (Sky-bot Job Scheduler/ Windows Task Scheduler/ Unix Crontab) - Documenting all changes made to Scripts/Objects and SQL as part of reporting responsibilities. - Ticket queue Management and resolutions. - Taking Ownership of the tickets and incidents. - Investigation of critical incidents/ Batch job crash and revert back to client with detailed explanations. - Resolve Incident via Ticket queue System (ServiceNow). - Make Changes to application/ SQL Manipulations/ Script via Changes Order Tickets. - Proposed Automation of Several daily Operations. ( Personal Java Desktop Application to Monitor jobs, Reports and SLA) -Reporting all Actions carried out during the shift including: Incidents Resolved. Openned Incident. Critical Change Order Substitutions. Critical Change Order Executed. -- Worked on several development projects in parallel. -- Attended Daily meetings and Scrum Meeting for Project developments. -- Proper decision making in order to resolve critical issue. (Proper time management)
